title: President Donald J. Trump is Reimposing Sanctions Lifted Under the Horrible Iran Deal – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 6, 2018
Our policy is based on a clear-eyed assessment of the Iranian dictatorship, its sponsorship of terrorism, and its continuing aggression in the Middle East and all around the world.
						President Donald J. Trump					REIMPOSING TOUGH SANCTIONS: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration is taking action to reimpose sanctions lifted under the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA).ENSURING FULL ENFORCEMENT: President Trump will continue to stand up to the Iranian regime’s aggression, and the United States will fully enforce the reimposed sanctions.PROTECTING OUR NATIONAL SECURITY: The JCPOA was defective at its core and failed to guarantee the safety of the American people.Read the full text of the Executive Order. Read the full statement from President Trump.
